page.title: STN-LCD maker EDT projects above 130 CSTN capacity growth in 2Q <b>...</b>
page.text: Emerging Display Technologies (EDT), specializing in small-to-medium STN/CSTN-LCD panels, will ramp up its monthly capacity for CSTN LCDs from 30,000 units at present to 70,000 in the second quarter of 2005, according to the company.
